data.text:
Chris Evert Net Worth: Chris Evert is a former professional tennis player who has a net worth of $16 million. She is considered one of the greatest female tennis players of all time, having won 18 Grand Slam singles titles and three Grand Slam doubles titles. Evert was born in Fort Lauderdale, Florida, and began playing tennis at the age of five. She turned professional in 1972 and quickly rose to the top of the women's game. Evert was known for her consistent play and her ability to win on all surfaces.

Evert retired from professional tennis in 1989 and was inducted into the International Tennis Hall of Fame in 1995. She has since worked as a tennis commentator and has also written several books about tennis. Evert is married to former Olympic skier Andy Mill and they have three children.

Evert's success on the tennis court has earned her a significant amount of money. She has won over $10 million in prize money and has also earned millions more from endorsements and other business ventures. Evert is a role model for many young tennis players and her legacy will continue to inspire generations to come.
